view

Interface ViewController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ViewControllerImpl

    public interface ViewController
    This interface represents the view's functionalities available to controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeScene(Pair<SceneType,javafx.geometry.Dimension2D> settings)
      This method requests the initialization of a new scene.
      void notifySceneEvent(Notifications notification)
      This method notifies to the view special events to be served, like pause, win or lose status.
      void setListener(Control listener)
      This method sets the object that will be used to communicate with the controller.
      void updateScene(java.util.List<ControlCommunication> entities)
      If a dynamic scene is present, this method updates position and behaviour of entities in the screen.

    • Method Detail

      • updateScene

        void updateScene(java.util.List<ControlCommunication> entities)
        If a dynamic scene is present, this method updates position and behaviour of entities in the screen.
        Parameters:
        entities - The list of entities to draw and their informations
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - When it is called without first initializing a dynamic view
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the parameter is null or in the list two entities with the same ID are present

      • changeScene

        void changeScene(Pair<SceneType,javafx.geometry.Dimension2D> settings)
        This method requests the initialization of a new scene.
        Parameters:
        settings - A pair containing the type of the new scene and the required dimension
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If a null argument is passed

      • notifySceneEvent

        void notifySceneEvent(Notifications notification)
        This method notifies to the view special events to be served, like pause, win or lose status.
        Parameters:
        notification - The type of status to represent
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If a null argument is passed
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If called without first initializing a dynamic view

      • setListener

        void setListener(Control listener)
        This method sets the object that will be used to communicate with the controller. This method can only be called once.
        Parameters:
        listener - The controller listener
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If a null object has been passed
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the listener is already present
